medical_history.chief_complaint: Worsening and migrated abdominal pain to the RLQ.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Initial presentation included several days of intermittent epigastric abdominal pain that was dull and burning in sensation with nausea. Symptoms worsened and migrated to the RLQ. The patient has endorsed anorexia and nausea, with regular bowel movements and no fever, chills, or vomiting.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Right ovarian cyst; Right ovarian cystectomy.
